attributes.action: REPEAL ALL REPRESSIVE LEGISLATION ENACTED SINCE 1997 AND RETURN FREEDOM OF CHOICE TO THE PEOPLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Repeal the bans on gatherings, hunting, smoking, and travel on ancient roads. Reduce silly speed limits outside towns. Repeal legislation which allows the police to operate a shoot to kill policy and arrest innocent people on suspicion.  Repeal acts which prevent freedom of speech. Stop censoring e-petitions. Repeal legislation which encourages minority ghettoes to flourish. Immediately stop helicopter, satellite and CCTV surveillance of the people. Stop manipulating the democratic process. Abandon the pursuit of even more repressive measures targetted against the populace, Stop falsifying figures to support extremist government proposals and actions. Repeal legislation which allows police to persecute gatherings of motorcyclists and innocent people. RETURN GENUINE FREEDOM TO THE PEOPLE.
